page.title: 08Church Clubs,Bromley,S.E.
page.content: Much of the recreational activities are provided by the churches.St.Mary's Church has a Sunday School,a judo club, a Jubilee club for mothers and under-fives,and a ladies club.There are Brownies,Cubs,Scouts and Guides.The Baptist church has a youth club and a Bible Study and Prayer Meeting.There are also Boys' and Girls' Brigades. St.Martin of Tours has a playgroup every morning, a toddler and push-chair service on Friday afternoons, a Scout Group and a Pensioners Club.Christ Church has a Brownie Group. Chelsfield Methodist Church has keep-fit,a play group, Brownies,drama groups and a youth club.
